derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (as a noun): from medieval Latin residentiarius, from Latin resident- remaining (see resident)

auth_sentence.content: His role at St Paul's Cathedral was partly as Canon Residentiary, concerned with engagement with the City of London.
